name: lm-writing-tool
description: LLM-powered writing tool for VSCode. Checks your grammer using Ollama or Github Copilot.

commands.title: LLM writing tool: Start Text Check for Current Document
LLM writing tool: Stop Text Check for Current Document
LLM writing tool: Rewrite current selection
LLM writing tool: Get synonyms for selection
LLM writing tool: Reset prompts to defaults
LLM writing tool: Reset all settings to defaults

lmWritingTool.prompts.proofreading.default:
Proofread the following message in American English. If it is gramatically correct, just respond with the word "Correct". If it is gramatically incorrect or has spelling mistakes, respond with "Correction: ", followed by the corrected version. If you make a correction, write the whole corrected text, not just the segments with corrections. Do not add additional text or explanations. Do not change special commands, code, escape characters, or mathematical formulas. Only correct grammatical issues, do not change the content:
{text}
lmWritingTool.prompts.proofreading.description: System prompt for proofreading text. Use {text} as a placeholder for the text to be proofread.

lmWritingTool.prompts.rewrite.default:
Rewrite the following text for clarity in American English. Do not change special commands, code, escape characters, or mathematical formulas. Respond just with the rewritten version of the text, no extra explanation:
{text}
lmWritingTool.prompts.rewrite.description: System prompt for rewriting text. Use {text} as a placeholder for the text to be rewritten.

lmWritingTool.prompts.synonyms.default: Give up to 5 synonyms for the expression "{expression}". Just respond with the synonyms, separated by newlines. No extra explanation or context needed.
lmWritingTool.prompts.synonyms.description: System prompt for finding synonyms. Use {expression} as a placeholder for the expression to find synonyms for.

lmWritingTool.ollama.model.description: The Ollama model to use for text processing. Make sure the model is available on your local Ollama server.

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
